16th june 2013, Uttarakhand floods caused a major havoc, killed people in huge nos., made a huge dent in economy, tourism & life of people. This horror stories of people who survived and the hardships dey faced made me indulge into the disaster studies and following year I enrolled for PG program in Disaster Management. 

Disasters dont impact people for a short time, but its the long lasting effects which actually cripple the society at large. Let's pledge to make this world a better place, let's equip ourselves wd basics of disaster & emergency preparedness, let's make a safe & resilient world !

Watch how 2000 kanals of paddy land in Budgam district turned barren as water channel irrigating these once fertile lands remained blocked since 2014. Irrigation Dept failed to clear the blockage caused by a landslide more than seven years ago leaving hundreds of farming families in lurch and huge tracts of land barren.

#kashmirobserver #kashmir #land #irrigation #barren #department #failure #water #channel #block #floods #well #blockage

Flooding is the world‚Äôs costliest natural hazard, and its impacts are only getting worse as the climate changes. By 2030, floods are expected to affect 147 million people a year at a cost of over $700 billion dollars. With the right early warning systems, most flood impacts are avoidable. Flood Map Live software runs day and night using the latest rainfall now-casts and forecasts. This allows us to predict the time and depth of flooding at your location helping you take the right cause of action to protect your people and your property. 

#floodmapping #floodforecasting #floodinsurance #fema #climatechange #flood #floods #flooding

R.N. and his family were particularly affected by the heavy rains. Their entire house was destroyed by the storms. They stayed on their property to protect still usable material from theft. The family lived there under a tarpaulin.

Pine Ridge Cemetery was supposed to be the final resting place of loved ones ‚Äî likely including former slaves ‚Äî but the Pearl River flood of 2020 and ensuing erosion have changed that.

Pine Ridge Missionary Baptist Church, with a congregation of about 75 that meets twice a month, neither has the authority or financial resources to address bank stabilization or move at-risk graves. And, for one reason or another, county, state and federal agencies contacted said they have no jurisdiction to step in. 

Check out the link in our bio to read the full story, originally reported by the clarionledger

Have you heard about the Gossamer effect? It‚Äôs a survival instinct used by many ground living spiders in response to floods and intense rainfall.

After the recent rain and storms around Victoria, millions of spiders have spun their webs over large parts of Gippsland along the South Gippsland Highway.

The phenomenon looks amazing and scary at the same time. The webs will most likely blow away in the wind but I would hate to be anywhere near there right now.

Photo credit: Channel 7

- MU.
